'''Cujas''' was a powerful [[Netherese]] [[priest]] who taught at the [[Alchemical Seminary]] in [[Eileanar]] shortly before its destruction in {{yearlinkConvert|3520|NY}}.
document_data.Activities: Cujas specialized in the study of elemental [[water]], liquids, and the [[transmutation]] of similar materials. She originally came to fame when she created a pool of "heavy water" that could support the weight of rock, and also managed to transmute water into an [[nitroglycerin|explosive fluid]] that had to be stabilized with sawdust. She later became a teacher at the Seminary and worked under [[Quintus]] to teach her field of elemental transmutation.
